Customer Issue: I was charged twice for my subscription.
Resolution Response: We apologize for the inconvenience. We have refunded the duplicate charge.

Customer Issue: Why is my bill higher than expected?
Resolution Response: Your bill may include additional fees or a price increase. Please check the breakdown in your account.

Customer Issue: I want to update my payment method.
Resolution Response: You can update your payment details in the billing section of your account settings.

Customer Issue: My app keeps crashing on startup.
Resolution Response: Try clearing the app cache or reinstalling the app. Let us know if the issue persists.

Customer Issue: The website is not loading properly.
Resolution Response: Please try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser.

Customer Issue: My camera is not working on video calls.
Resolution Response: Ensure that the app has camera permissions enabled in your device settings.

Customer Issue: I forgot my password and can't reset it.
Resolution Response: You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link. If you need further assistance, contact support.

Customer Issue: My account was locked after multiple login attempts.
Resolution Response: For security reasons, your account is temporarily locked. Please try again in 30 minutes or reset your password.

Customer Issue: Can I change my email address?
Resolution Response: Yes, you can update your email in the account settings. A verification email will be sent.

Customer Issue: Does this product come with a warranty?
Resolution Response: Yes, this product includes a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.

Customer Issue: What are the dimensions of this item?
Resolution Response: The product dimensions are listed in the specifications section on the product page.

Customer Issue: Is this item available in other colors?
Resolution Response: Yes, this product is available in multiple colors. Please check the available options on the website.

Customer Issue: I want to request a refund for my order.
Resolution Response: You can request a refund through your order history. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

Customer Issue: Why was my refund denied?
Resolution Response: Refunds may be denied if the return policy criteria are not met. Please review our return policy.

Customer Issue: Can I get a refund if I used a promo code?
Resolution Response: Refunds are issued for the amount paid after applying the promo code.

Customer Issue: My order is delayed. When will it arrive?
Resolution Response: We apologize for the delay. You can check the latest tracking updates in your order history.

Customer Issue: Why is my package stuck in transit?
Resolution Response: Shipping delays may occur due to carrier issues. Please allow additional time for delivery.

Customer Issue: Can I expedite my shipping?
Resolution Response: If your order has not yet shipped, you may upgrade to express shipping in your order settings.

Customer Issue: How do I cancel my subscription?
Resolution Response: You can cancel your subscription in your account settings under the 'Subscription' section.

Customer Issue: Will I be charged if I cancel before the renewal date?
Resolution Response: No, if you cancel before your next billing cycle, you will not be charged.

Customer Issue: Can I pause my subscription instead of canceling?
Resolution Response: Yes, we offer a pause option for up to 3 months.

Customer Issue: Where is my package?
Resolution Response: You can track your package using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation.

Customer Issue: My tracking number is not updating.
Resolution Response: Tracking updates may take up to 24 hours. If there's no update after that, contact the carrier.

Customer Issue: Can I change my delivery address after placing the order?
Resolution Response: Once an order is processed, the delivery address cannot be changed. Please contact support for options.
